name: Packing List
description:
A narrative text-based adventure about navigating a strange new land. Choose your items carefully, you never know what might end up being useful down the road.

Unfortunately, the menu is inherent to the SugarCube Twine mod I'm using, and sometimes it breaks on phones or smaller devices, stopping progress. It isn't necessary to play through the game, and I advise just ignoring the weird black bar along the left side.
